```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(bslib)
library(htmltools)
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
# Install thematic and un-comment for themed static plots (i.e., ggplot2)
# thematic::thematic_rmd()
```

# Home {data-icon="fa-home"}

```{r, echo = FALSE}

# Hero banner
card_banner = htmltools::div(
  style = "width: 100%; margin-bottom: 20px;",
  htmltools::img(
    src = "images/hero_image_cropped_banner.png",
    alt = "Hero banner",
    style = "width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 300px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 8px; display: block;"
  )
)

# Main bio card with sidebar
card_bundle = page_sidebar(
  bslib::card(
    card_header(
      class = "bg-primary text-white",
      card_title(htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("user-graduate"), "About"))
    ),
    card_body(
      htmltools::p(
        htmltools::strong("Dr. Timothy (Tim) Fraser"), " is an ",
        htmltools::strong("Assistant Teaching Professor"), " in the ",
        htmltools::strong("Systems Engineering Program"), " at ",
        htmltools::strong("Cornell University"), ", where he has been working since 2022. ",
        "He is also ", htmltools::strong("Coordinator"), " for the ",
        htmltools::strong("Center for Transportation, Environment, and Community Health (CTECH)"), "."
      ),
      htmltools::p(
        "Dr. Fraser is a ", htmltools::strong("computational social scientist"), 
        ", developing methods, systems, and software to help communities combat environmental crises. ",
        "He has published ", htmltools::strong(">50 peer-reviewed studies"), ", plus dashboards, R packages, and software, ",
        "on urban resilience and environmental systems in the US and Japan. ",
        "He uses big data, networks, GIS, AI, and more to understand environmental policy systems. ",
        "His research has been funded by multiple national grants, including ", htmltools::strong("Fulbright"), "."
      ),
      htmltools::p(
        "He has advised researchers on social infrastructure at the ",
        htmltools::strong("OECD"), " and ", htmltools::strong("UN Development Programme's Accelerator Labs"), 
        ", and earned his ", htmltools::strong("PhD from Northeastern University"), " in 2022."
      ),
      htmltools::p(
        htmltools::strong("Current Research Focus:"), " Developing AI and cloud computing tools to quantify, visualize, ",
        "and communicate environmental policy data to the public, to support community action and resilience ",
        "in socio-technical systems. "
      )
    ),
    card_footer(
      htmltools::div(
        class = "d-flex gap-2",
        htmltools::a(
          htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("file-pdf"), " View CV"),
          class = "btn btn-primary",
          href = "https://timothyfraser.com/cv",
          target = "_blank"
        ),
        htmltools::a(
          htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("university"), " Cornell Website"),
          class = "btn btn-outline-primary",
          href = "https://www.engineering.cornell.edu/people/timothy-fraser/",
          target = "_blank"
        ),
        htmltools::a(
          htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("github"), " GitHub"),
          class = "btn btn-outline-primary",
          href = "https://github.com/timothyfraser",
          target = "_blank"
        ),
        htmltools::a(
          htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("linkedin"), " LinkedIn"),
          class = "btn btn-outline-primary",
          href = "https://www.linkedin.com/in/timothy-fraser-698786186/",
          target = "_blank"
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  sidebar = bslib::sidebar(
    card(
      htmltools::div(
        style = "width: 100%; text-align: center;",
        htmltools::img(
          src = "images/headshot_cropped.png",
          alt = "Dr. Tim Fraser headshot",
          style = "width: 100%; max-width: 250px; height: auto; object-fit: contain; border-radius: 8px; display: block; margin: 0 auto;"
        )
      ),
      card_body(
        htmltools::h3("Dr. Tim Fraser", class = "text-primary text-center"),
        htmltools::p(
          class = "text-center text-muted",
          htmltools::strong("Computational Social Scientist")
        ),
        htmltools::hr(),
        htmltools::p(
          class = "small text-center",
          shiny::icon("map-marker-alt"), " Cornell University",
          htmltools::br(),
          shiny::icon("envelope"), " timothy.fraser.1@gmail.com"
        )
      )
    ),
    open = "open",
    width = "300px",
    bg = "#f8f9fa"
  )
)
```

# Research {data-orientation=rows, data-icon="fa-microscope"}

```{r research_overview, echo = FALSE}
card_research = htmltools::div(
  id = "card_research_wrapper",
  card(
    card_header(
      class = "bg-primary text-white",
      card_title(htmltools::tagList(shiny::icon("microscope"), " Research Overview"))
    ),
    card_body(
      style = "overflow: visible !important; height: 100% !important; max-height: none !important; min-height: auto !important;",
      layout_column_wrap(
        width = 1/2,
        card_body(
          style = "overflow: visible !important; height: auto !important;",
          htmltools::h4("Research Focus"),
          htmltools::p(
            "Dr. Fraser's research focuses on developing AI and cloud computing tools ",
            "to quantify, visualize, and communicate environmental policy data to the public, ",
            "supporting community action and resilience in socio-technical systems."
          ),
          htmltools::h5("Key Areas:"),
          htmltools::tags$ul(
            htmltools::tags$li("Urban resilience and environmental systems"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Transportation emissions and climate action"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Social infrastructure and community resilience"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Network analysis and big data analytics"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Environmental policy in the US and Japan")
          )
        ),
        card_body(
          style = "overflow: visible !important; height: auto !important;",
          htmltools::h4("Research Highlights"),
          htmltools::tags$ul(
            htmltools::tags$li(htmltools::strong("51"), " peer-reviewed publications"),
            htmltools::tags$li(htmltools::strong("10+"), " R packages and dashboards"),
            htmltools::tags$li(htmltools::strong("50+"), " student coauthors"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Social Network Analysis, GIS, Panel Statistics, Surveys"),
            htmltools::tags$li("Consulted for OECD and UN Development Programme")
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
```
